Key Arguments: The legislation contains broad and subjective definitions that could be politically loaded.
The definition of harm is too expansive and could target religious beliefs and traditional views.
The bill could restrict free speech on important topics like climate change.
Exclusions for professional news content and government-authorized content are hypocritical.
Freedom of speech is essential for a healthy democracy.
Notable Quotes: There is a great danger in framing legislation which contains politically-loaded, unnecessarily broad, and highly subjective definitions.
I am concerned that this legislation could be used particularly to target religious platforms or individuals who hold religious beliefs.
A healthy, functioning democracy requires freedom of speech.
